answers.answer: I had my son at 35wks via csection due to preeclamplsia and he came home after 1wk of nicu and is perfect now 14mths on. The original plan was to get me to 38wks as that is full term here. I was told if breathing is fine and feeding ok he wouldn't need nicu so 37wks should be fine if your dr thinks so. I hope everything goes great for you and enjoy those baby cuddles!
I had my little girl at 37 +2 naturally and she was perfectly fine and came home 2 days later (2 days insteadof the usual one only because I tore really bad and I needed to stay!)

question: Due to preeclampsia I am rescheduled to have my baby boy aug 1 . The day I turn 37 weeks.  I am sooo excited to finally meet him!
title: 37 weeks ok??
